title: Microsoft’s DirectStorage may improve loading times by 200%, but don’t get too excited
description: Microsoft has introduced GPU decompression to DirectStorage 1.1, resulting in up to three times faster loading in games. There's a catch, though.

title: Nvidia just changed its mind on a controversial cryptomining feature
description: It seems that Nvidia may have changed its mind about allowing cryptomining on RTX 30-series graphics cards.
